[b][u][size=2]INSTALLATION & OTHER INFO:[/size][/u][/b]
[color=#b1e3f1][size=1][i]> Download the file and read the README.txt inside the rar for more info on current replacers and installation instructions.[/i][/size][/color][/center][center][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#3d85c6][/color][/font][/size]






































[i][color=#980000][size=1]I have permission to use all the music included in the mods.
(that includes a few remixes made by myself)[/size][/color][/i][/center]
